entry.title: WIND WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 1:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.3°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 80 km/h gusting to 100. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Wet flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Wet flurries beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail this evening and after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
